channel.title: Posts on Hey, what's here?
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hey, what's here?

item.title: My Second Post
item.description: Oh, so when I create a post with hugo new it’s set to draft by default. This won’t publish unless I un-draft it first. That’s helpful. Also, do I now have $\Sigma$ MathJax?

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Measuring them lines I am going to type a few sentences to see where the lines break and how big the typeface is. Also, I’m going to see if code shows up in a different type face, and whether a code block also shows up on a different background.
